refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: c_link is a boolean function which checks if the routine routine_name is currently linked. This function returns a boolean value true or false. When used with two return values, the function c_link returns a boolean value in test and the number of the shared library which contains routine_name in ilib (when test is true).
